{"id":531304390,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1627778104,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"52 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/531304390/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Two Sum IV - Input is a BST","memory":"42.1 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for a binary tree node.\n * struct TreeNode {\n *     int val;\n *     TreeNode *left;\n *     TreeNode *right;\n *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left), right(right) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    set <int> s;\n    bool findTarget(TreeNode* root, int k) {\n      bool ans = dfs(root,k);\n        return ans ;\n    }\n    bool dfs(TreeNode* root ,int sum){\n        if(root == NULL)\n            return false;\n        if(s.find(sum -root->val) != s.end()){\n            return true;\n        }\n        s.insert(root->val);\n        bool left = dfs(root->left,sum);\n        bool right = dfs(root->right,sum);\n        return left || right ;\n        \n          \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"two-sum-iv-input-is-a-bst"}
